GenericSoftwareObject The GenericSoftwareObject class is the wrapper class for the elements that are recorded in the Vital Product Data (VPD) Registry.

Product  
ProductAction The ProductAction class is the base class for all beans that can be added to the product tree in a Universal project.
ProductActionBeanInfo NOTE : This API is for InstallShield internal use.
ProductActionEvent  
ProductActionSupport The ProductActionSupport class provides run-time support for ProductAction classes during the install and uninstall processes.
ProductBean The ProductBean abstract class is the base class for the elements that compose the installation ProductTree.
ProductBeanBeanInfo NOTE : This API is for InstallShield internal use.
ProductBeanCondition The ProductBeanCondition abstract class is the super class of all product conditions.
ProductBeanConditionBeanInfo NOTE : This API is for InstallShield internal use.
